titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to reduce the amount of the premium charged for enrollment in part A of the Medicare program for individuals not receiving third-party assistance in payment of the premium.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/5/1996--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to reduce to zero the monthly premium charges for certain individuals enrolled under Medicare part A (Hospital Insurance) who do not receive State or other specified (third-party) assistance towards payment of the premium.
